version_description:
- Fixbug some bugs UI on iPad
- Continue optimize effect for main character

- Add new backgrounds in game play screen
- The game has been localized in 2 languages: English, Vietnamese
- Fix bug "Can't login google account to save or restore data"
- Fix bug "Can't purchased some characters"
- Optimize game performance
- Fix some minor bugs
Our development team is continually improving the game to deliver the best mobile entertainment. Thank you for playing and we hope you continue to support future updates of Stickman Warriors - Super Dragon Shadow Fight.

- Add new 4 maps: "Saya Planet", "The Moon", "Deadly Stage" and "God-Like" in the Story mode
- Add 12 new characters
- Optimize game performance
- Fix some minor bugs
Our development team is continually improving the game to deliver the best mobile entertainment. Thank you for playing and we hope you continue to support future updates of Stickman Warriors - Super Dragon Shadow Fight.

- Fix bug can't buy characters by golds or diamonds.
- Fix Culler Golden's unability to use his first skill.
- Fix the game crash after completed the tutorial.
- Add more characters's gift codes.
- Fix some minor bugs.
- Optimize game performance.
Our development team is continually improving the game to deliver the best mobile entertainment. Thank you for playing and we hope you continue to support future updates of Stickman Warriors - Super Dragon Shadow Fight.

New in Version 5.6!
- Add 3 new maps: "Fioros Plain", "Red Volcano" and "Alantia" in the Story mode
- Add 3 new characters: "Torro", "Baby Geta" and "Migra"
- Optimize game performance
- Fix some minor bugs
Our development team is continually improving the game to deliver the best mobile entertainment. Thank you for playing and we hope you continue to support future updates of Stickman Warriors - Super Dragon Shadow Fight
